Variable.name: allScreens
Variable.doc: Controls whether corners are drawn on all screens or just the primary screen. Defaults to true
stripped_doc: Controls whether corners are drawn on all screens or just the primary screen. Defaults to true
Variable.desc: Controls whether corners are drawn on all screens or just the primary screen. Defaults to true

Variable.name: radius
Variable.doc: Controls the radius of the rounded corners, in points. Defaults to 6
stripped_doc: Controls the radius of the rounded corners, in points. Defaults to 6
Variable.desc: Controls the radius of the rounded corners, in points. Defaults to 6

Variable.name: level
Variable.doc: Controls which level of the screens the corners are drawn at. See `hs.canvas.windowLevels` for more information. Defaults to `screenSaver + 1`
stripped_doc: Controls which level of the screens the corners are drawn at. See `hs.canvas.windowLevels` for more information. Defaults to `screenSaver + 1`
Variable.desc: Controls which level of the screens the corners are drawn at. See `hs.canvas.windowLevels` for more information. Defaults to `screenSaver + 1`

items.name: start
items.doc:
Starts RoundedCorners

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The RoundedCorners object

Notes:
 * This will draw the rounded screen corners and start watching for changes in screen sizes/layouts, reacting accordingly
notes: * This will draw the rounded screen corners and start watching for changes in screen sizes/layouts, reacting accordingly

items.name: stop
items.doc:
Stops RoundedCorners

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The RoundedCorners object

Notes:
 * This will remove all rounded screen corners and stop watching for changes in screen sizes/layouts
notes: * This will remove all rounded screen corners and stop watching for changes in screen sizes/layouts

Method.name: start

Returns:
